alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 8:03PM EDT until June 22 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 703 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Graceville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Graceville, Marianna, Chipley, Cottondale, Alford, Campbellton, Richter Crossroads, Jacob City, Kynesville, Steele City, Cottondale Airport, Jacobs, Browntown, Bahoma and Round Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
